#The logistic function
```{r}
logistic <- function(x){
  exp(x) / (1 + exp(x))
}
```

#Linear Combinations
```{r}
linear_combine <- function(data, coefs){
  data = data.frame()
  coefs = c(intercept,balance,income)
  result <- 0
  for (nm in names(coefs)){
    if (nm == "intercept"){
      result <- result + coefs[[nm]]
    }else{
      result <-result + coefs[[nm]] * data[[nm]]
    }
  }
}
```
